attributes.action: Enable the recall of politicians found guilty of lying during an election
attributes.additional_details:
The Government should make lying during an election campaign an offence, and anyone found guilty should be subject to recall.
 
This should help restore faith in the political system.
attributes.background: To restore trust in politics, politicians who knowingly use falsehoods to secure election should face recall. Waiting up to five years to remove them is not good enough.
